name: Spotted Pig's Salty Dog
description: This cocktail from The Spotted Pig is seriously refreshing on a hot day. The salt helps cut the grapefruit's bitterness, rather than drowning the grapefruit in sweetness.

recipeInstructions.text: To make the grapefruit-infused vodka, cut the grapefruit into 8 pieces. Put in a large resealable nonreactive container. Add vodka. Let sit for 1 week, stirring once a day. Taste and remove fruit when you've reached the desired grapefruit level.
For the cocktail: rim a highball glass with Maldon sea salt, then fill the glass with ice. Add infused vodka and grapefruit juice. Stir gently and serve.
